citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"1876820d-9d63-4c37-bf60-c83c343419fd\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"05\", \"08\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Ce NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 a \u00e9t\u00e9 d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 le 2015-09-12 au Folger Deep. Folger Deep est un endroit profond dans Folger Passage, pr\u00e8s d'un mont sous-marin semblable \u00e0 un pilier, o\u00f9 la productivit\u00e9 et les mammif\u00e8res marins sont observ\u00e9s. Cet instrument est un Enregistreur de Pression du Fond Marin. Les enregistreurs de pression du fond marin (BPR) sont des instruments qui permettent de d\u00e9tecter de petits changements de pression sur le fond marin. Il a \u00e9t\u00e9 deploy\u00e9 sur une plateforme fixe. Les donn\u00e9es de ce d\u00e9ploiement sont archiv\u00e9es et accessibles sur l\u2019infrastructure num\u00e9rique Oceans 3.0 du R\u00e9seau Canadien des Oc\u00e9ans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualit\u00e9 et produits d\u00e9riv\u00e9s selon les conventions \u00e9tablies.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Folger Deep Enregistreur de Pression du Fond Marin d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 2015-09-12\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/1876820d-9d63-4c37-bf60-c83c343419fd?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"1876820d-9d63-4c37-bf60-c83c343419fd\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"05\", \"08\"]}], \"abstract\": \"The NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 was deployed on 2015-09-12 at Folger Deep. Folger Deep is a deep location in Folger Passage near a pillar-like seamount, where productivity and marine mammals are observed. This device is a Bottom Pressure Recorder. Bottom Pressure Recorders (BPR) are instruments that can detect small changes in pressure on the seafloor. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Folger Deep Bottom Pressure Recorder Deployed 2015-09-12\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/1876820d-9d63-4c37-bf60-c83c343419fd?local=en\"}]

          </mcc:codeSpace>
          <mcc:description>
            <gco:CharacterString>The EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset is a structured dataset of Coordinate Reference Systems and Coordinate Transformations, accessible through this online registry (www.epsg-registry.org) or, as downloadable zip files, through IOGP's EPSG home page at www.epsg.org. The geographic coverage of the data is worldwide, but it is stressed that the dataset does not and cannot record all possible geodetic parameters in use around the world.</gco:CharacterString>

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>The NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 was deployed on 2015-09-12 at Folger Deep. Folger Deep is a deep location in Folger Passage near a pillar-like seamount, where productivity and marine mammals are observed. This device is a Bottom Pressure Recorder. Bottom Pressure Recorders (BPR) are instruments that can detect small changes in pressure on the seafloor. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="fra">Ce NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 a été déployé le 2015-09-12 au Folger Deep. Folger Deep est un endroit profond dans Folger Passage, près d'un mont sous-marin semblable à un pilier, où la productivité et les mammifères marins sont observés. Cet instrument est un Enregistreur de Pression du Fond Marin. Les enregistreurs de pression du fond marin (BPR) sont des instruments qui permettent de détecter de petits changements de pression sur le fond marin. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>
      <mri:status>
        <mcc:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelist/cat/codelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode" codeListValue="completed"/>
      </mri:status>
      <mri:topicCategory>
        <mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>oceans</mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>
      </mri:topicCategory>

              </gex:westBoundLongitude>
              <gex:eastBoundLongitude>

      <mmi:maintenanceNote>
        <gco:CharacterString>Previous metadata record [dataset title: English = Folger Deep Bottom Pressure Recorder Deployed 2015-09-12, dataset title: French = Folger Deep Enregistreur de Pression du Fond Marin déployé 2015-09-12, abstract: English = The NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 was deployed on 2015-09-12 at Folger Deep. Folger Deep is a deep location in Folger Passage near a pillar-like seamount, where productivity and marine mammals are observed. This device is a Bottom Pressure Recorder. Bottom Pressure Recorders (BPR) are instruments that can detect small changes in pressure on the seafloor. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices., abstract: French = Ce NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 a été déployé le 2015-09-12 au Folger Deep. Folger Deep est un endroit profond dans Folger Passage, près d'un mont sous-marin semblable à un pilier, où la productivité et les mammifères marins sont observés. Cet instrument est un Enregistreur de Pression du Fond Marin. Les enregistreurs de pression du fond marin (BPR) sont des instruments qui permettent de détecter de petits changements de pression sur le fond marin. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.] differs from current metadata record [dataset title: English = Folger Passage Bottom Pressure Recorder Deployed 2015-09-12, dataset title: French = Folger Passage Enregistreur de Pression du Fond Marin déployé 2015-09-12, abstract: English = The NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 was deployed on 2015-09-12 at Folger Passage. Folger Passage is located on the continental shelf of the Pacific Ocean. This device is a Bottom Pressure Recorder. Bottom Pressure Recorders (BPR) are instruments that can detect small changes in pressure on the seafloor. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices., abstract: French = Ce NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 a été déployé le 2015-09-12 au Folger Passage. Folger Passage est situé sur le plateau continental de l'océan Pacifique. Cet instrument est un Enregistreur de Pression du Fond Marin. Les enregistreurs de pression du fond marin (BPR) sont des instruments qui permettent de détecter de petits changements de pression sur le fond marin. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.]</gco:CharacterString>

          </mcc:level>

      <mac:instrument>
        <mac:MI_Instrument>
          <mac:identifier>
            <mcc:MD_Identifier>
              <mcc:authority>

                  <cit:onlineResource>

                        <gco:CharacterString>https://data.oceannetworks.ca/DeviceListing?DeviceId=22790</gco:CharacterString>
                      </cit:linkage>
                    </cit:CI_OnlineResource>
                  </cit:onlineResource>

                <gco:CharacterString>Local identifier for the specific device</gco:CharacterString>
              </mcc:description>
            </mcc:MD_Identifier>
          </mac:identifier>
          <mac:type>
            <gco:CharacterString>Natural Resources Canada, Geological Survey of Canada [custom] Bottom Pressure Recorder</gco:CharacterString>
          </mac:type>
          <mac:description>
            <gco:CharacterString>A bottom pressure recorder designed by Natural Resources Canada's (NRCan) Geological Survey of Canada (GSC) Pacific Geoscience Centre (PGS). It was designed specifically for the Canadian underwater cable system NEPTUNE as part of the Ocean Networks Canada Ocean Observatory Project. As well as monitoring pressure, the system also measures temperature and conductivity, to facilitate detection and characterisation of tsunamis and other shallow and deep oceanographic transients. Data is recorded to onboard flash memory, and the BPR is supplied with an additional non-rechargeable lithium thionyl chloride battery pack to provide power during cable power outages. The BPR is supplied with analog-to-digital conversion electronics, a real-time clock, an on-board logger, pressure housing and a seafloor frame compatible with ROV constraints. Temperature sensor: GE Industries thermistor; Pressure sensor: Paroscientific 8B4000-1; Conductivity sensor: Sea-Bird 4M. When connected to the NEPTUNE cable system, the BPR produces pressure measurements at 1 Hz. The sample period is 1 second for pressure and 10 seconds for temperature and conductivity. The BPR has an absolute pressure accuracy < 1 ppm full scale.</gco:CharacterString>
          </mac:description>
        </mac:MI_Instrument>
      </mac:instrument>
    </mac:MI_AcquisitionInformation>
  </mdb:acquisitionInformation>

name: 1876820d-9d63-4c37-bf60-c83c343419fd
notes: The NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 was deployed on 2015-09-12 at Folger Deep. Folger Deep is a deep location in Folger Passage near a pillar-like seamount, where productivity and marine mammals are observed. This device is a Bottom Pressure Recorder. Bottom Pressure Recorders (BPR) are instruments that can detect small changes in pressure on the seafloor. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.

notes_translated.en: The NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 was deployed on 2015-09-12 at Folger Deep. Folger Deep is a deep location in Folger Passage near a pillar-like seamount, where productivity and marine mammals are observed. This device is a Bottom Pressure Recorder. Bottom Pressure Recorders (BPR) are instruments that can detect small changes in pressure on the seafloor. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.
notes_translated.fr: Ce NRCan Bottom Pressure Recorder 5 a été déployé le 2015-09-12 au Folger Deep. Folger Deep est un endroit profond dans Folger Passage, près d'un mont sous-marin semblable à un pilier, où la productivité et les mammifères marins sont observés. Cet instrument est un Enregistreur de Pression du Fond Marin. Les enregistreurs de pression du fond marin (BPR) sont des instruments qui permettent de détecter de petits changements de pression sur le fond marin. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.

title: Folger Deep Bottom Pressure Recorder Deployed 2015-09-12

description.en: Home of Canada's Pacific Ocean Data

resources.description: Data is delivered via ERDDAP, a data server that gives a standardized way to download subsets of datasets in common file formats. This particular ERDDAP installation has oceanographic data from Ocean Networks Canada's instruments

description_translated.en: Data is delivered via ERDDAP, a data server that gives a standardized way to download subsets of datasets in common file formats. This particular ERDDAP installation has oceanographic data from Ocean Networks Canada's instruments

resources.name: ERDDAP
